events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-28 causing visible damage to the front bumper and headlight.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under auto accident due to the involvement of the insured car in a collision.
A claims specialist agent was assigned to assist the customer with the vehicle accident insurance claim process.
Acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and initiation of review procedures.
Customer was requested to submit the accident report, photos of vehicle damage, and police report for further investigation.
The insured provided all required documents including accident report, pictures of damage, and official police report.
Investigation team began review of submitted documentation and vehicle inspection to assess accident circumstances.
Investigation concluded confirming the insured vehicle was involved in collision and damage was consistent with reported incident.
A settlement offer was prepared based on damage assessment and sent to the customer for review and approval.
The customer responded accepting the proposed settlement offer and thanked the claims team for their support.
Final approval of the claim was granted to process payment based on agreed settlement terms.
Payment was disbursed to the customerâ€™s bank account covering the approved vehicle repair costs.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed following successful payment and customer confirmation.
All documentation and correspondence related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
